title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Valles Caldera welcomes everyone. Whether you delight in the challenge of a strenuous hike or prefer to sit quietly and watch the sunset, the preserve offers a great diversity of activities for you to enjoy. With so many adventures to choose from, you'll have some tough decisions to make.   Backcountry Access  Explore more of this supervolcano    Camping  Currently, camping is not available.    Cross-country Skiing &Snowshoeing  Glide across a winter wonderland    Day Hiking  Lace up your boots and explore    Fishing  Cast your line to hook a trout    Horseback Riding  Ride through open valles and forested trails    Hunting  Take a chance in one of New Mexico's premier elk and turkey hunting locations    Mountain Biking  Enjoy the scenery on two wheels    Ranger-Led Activities  Join a park ranger for walks, hikes, van tours, and campfire programs.    Wildlife Viewing  Test your observation skills with 51 species of mammals, 117 birds, 6 reptiles, 3 amphibians, and 6 fish     Guided Tours and Other Services These businesses are authorized to provide commercially guided activities and services.
